import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

  @override

    return Scaffold(

                    Text('85%', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 34, fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.orange[900])),
                    Text('Score', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, color: Colors.orange[700])),

                ),
              ),
            ),

            ),

            Row(

              children: [
                ElevatedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                    backgroundColor: Colors.orange[600],
                    foregroundColor: Colors.white,

                    shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(12)),
                    textStyle: TextStyle(fontFamily: 'Roboto'),

                  child: Text('Retake Quiz', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 15, fontWeight: FontWeight.w600)),

                ElevatedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},

                    foregroundColor: Colors.black,
